name: Logos PR
tag_list: logospr, hispanic, latin-america, pr, public-relations, media-relations, advertising, branding, digital, agency, integrated-communications, social-media, spanish-seo, internet-marketing, media, press-release, news
overview:
Company Profile Logos PR is a Miami-based result driven public relations and marketing communications firm specialized in the Hispanic and Latin America media markets. We develop integrated communications programs drawing from a broad range of disciplines including public relations consulting and strategy, branding and advertising, PR 2.0 - online and social media, media relations and events & promotional support. Logos PR helps clients in a variety of industries expand their brand awareness, reach new audiences and broaden their client base via targeted communications campaigns.

About Logos PR The company name, Logos PR, was derived from the words â€œLogosâ€ and â€œPRâ€. The first, an important word originating from the Greek word â€œLOGOSâ€ meaning â€œwordâ€, â€œthoughtâ€, â€œprincipleâ€, â€œreasonâ€ or â€œspeechâ€. LOGOS is also used to describe one of the three modes of persuasion: Logos (persuasion through reason or speech), Pathos (persuasion by emotional appeal) and Ethos (persuasion through moral competence, knowledge or expertise). The second word is short for Public Relations and describes the practice of managing communications between an organization and its audiences. When combined, these words describe the philosophy, expertise and services Logos PR provides our clients.
